channel.title: Client keeps closing on Windows 7 Home Premium
channel.description: every time i open a client and i double click the walk area or the map it exits the client window not the cmd window but then i press enter and that is closed 2 ive searched the internet but never found a solution im wondering what the problem i look in the ho(my cpu is hp and a laptop) and found no help there either. can some1 plz help me here?

item.title: Client keeps closing on Windows 7 Home Premium
item.dc:creator: @imsokool22 imsokool22
item.description:
@imsokool22 wrote:

yea umm dude do u have Vista or Win 7 if win 7 wat version u got if u have perfessional,ultimate,or enterprise(any bit) then u can download a virtual machine and that will fix it but it u dont check ur enviromental variables 1.click the Start button 2.then right click computer then right 3.click properties 4.then right click Advanced System settings 5.then right Click Enviromental Variables then go to http://runelocus.com/?action=rspstut then click chapter six to see what to enter in enviromental Variables then save it and try to run it again p.s. illl post some pics on how to get there:
1.

item.title: Client keeps closing on Windows 7 Home Premium
item.dc:creator: @Sage_Mode Sage Mode
item.description:
@Sage_Mode wrote:

OMFG this is so ironic, considering Taharok msg’d me help ON THIS LAST NIGHT :O!!! This happens with Vista and 7 (certain ones) get winxp Virtual machine or get Windows Vista 32 bit virtual machine, or disable your runtime flag -Xint, but it will make java run real slow! GET A VM. CREDITS TO TAHAROK TYVM :D.
